byline.original: By MATTHEW GOLDSTEIN and NATHANIEL POPPER

abstract: Document obtained through Freedom of Information Act indicates that former Assistant Atty Gen Lanny A Breuer organized a meeting in 2010 between Justice Dept prosecutors and Goldman Sachs executives focusing on methods for combating terrorism financing; meeting could reignite queries into Justice Dept's priorities in wake of financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Justice Department officials focused exclusively on terrorism issues when it met with Goldman officials in 2010, reviving questions about the government’s priorities after the financial crisis.

headline.main: U.S. Prosecutors Did Not Question Goldman on Financial Crisis in 2010 Meeting
headline.print_headline: U.S. Prosecutors Met With Goldman in ’10

snippet: Justice Department officials focused exclusively on terrorism issues when it met with Goldman officials in 2010, reviving questions about the government’s priorities after the financial crisis.
